Long-standing investment management traditions

About Finles

Proven provider of cutting edge investment solutions

Finles Capital is an investment boutique with a long track record specializing in alternative investment funds and servicing investment managers globally. The firm was founded in 1977 by Dolf van der Weij in the Netherlands as a preferred supplier to the white-collar union the NCHP — nowadays De Unie -— together with Achmea Insurance and AXA Insurance company.

Read our story

Investment focus

Finles Capital focuses on strategies that are specifically designed to meet the needs of professional investors seeking cost-effective access to attractive risk-adjusted returns. Over the years, our team has built expertise in the following asset classes:

Learn more

Private Debt

In the Private Debt segment we select managers that produce robust results and operate in niche markets.

Natural Resources

Our preferences for Natural Resources assets are tied to long-term oriented results and stable performance.

Secondaries

Our Private Equity Secondaries platform provides focused exposure to private equity secondary transactions globally.

Services

Your guide to the alternative investment industry

For more than 40 years, we have been delivering custom-made solutions tailored specifically to meet our clients objectives. We rely on our expertise in investment funds and financial strategies in order to achieve exceptional results.
